title: 86-Eighty Six- Special Edition - Coquelicots Blooming Across the Battlefield
description: "I have a duty to see everything that happens. No matter how much pain and sadness there is... Because I am Spearhead's handler."   recaps the story told in through the perspective of Vladilena "Lena" Milizé—the commander of Shinei Nouzen and the Spearhead Squadron.  [Written by MAL Rewrite]
